00017 #ifndef BOOST_MPL_AUX_PREPROCESSOR_PARAMS_HPP_INCLUDED
00018 #define BOOST_MPL_AUX_PREPROCESSOR_PARAMS_HPP_INCLUDED
00019 
00020 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/config/preprocessor.hpp"
00021 
00022 // BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS(0,T): <nothing>
00023 // BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS(1,T): T1
00024 // BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS(2,T): T1, T2
00025 // BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS(n,T): T1, T2, .., Tn
00026 
00027 #if !defined(BOOST_MPL_NO_OWN_PP_PRIMITIVES)
00028 
00029 #   include "boost/preprocessor/cat.hpp"
00030 
00031 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS(n,p) \
00032     BOOST_PP_CAT(BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS_,n)(p) \
00033     
00034 
00035 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS_0(p)
00036 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS_1(p) p##1
00037 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS_2(p) p##1,p##2
00038 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS_3(p) p##1,p##2,p##3
00039 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS_4(p) p##1,p##2,p##3,p##4
00040 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS_5(p) p##1,p##2,p##3,p##4,p##5
00041 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS_6(p) p##1,p##2,p##3,p##4,p##5,p##6
00042 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS_7(p) p##1,p##2,p##3,p##4,p##5,p##6,p##7
00043 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS_8(p) p##1,p##2,p##3,p##4,p##5,p##6,p##7,p##8
00044 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS_9(p) p##1,p##2,p##3,p##4,p##5,p##6,p##7,p##8,p##9
00045 
00046 #else
00047 
00048 #   include "boost/preprocessor/comma_if.hpp"
00049 #   include "boost/preprocessor/repeat.hpp"
00050 #   include "boost/preprocessor/inc.hpp"
00051 #   include "boost/preprocessor/cat.hpp"
00052 
00053 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_AUX_PARAM_FUNC(unused, i, param) \
00054     BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(i) \
00055     BOOST_PP_CAT(param, BOOST_PP_INC(i)) \
00056     
00057 
00058 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_PARAMS(n, param) \
00059     BOOST_PP_REPEAT_1( \
00060           n \
00061         , BOOST_MPL_PP_AUX_PARAM_FUNC \
00062         , param \
00063         ) \
00064     
00065 
00066 #endif // BOOST_MPL_NO_OWN_PP_PRIMITIVES
00067 
00068 #endif // BOOST_MPL_AUX_PREPROCESSOR_PARAMS_HPP_INCLUDED
